TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlTypeAttribute extends System.Attribute

remarks.para: The belongs to a family of attributes that controls how the serializes or deserializes an object. For a complete list of similar attributes, see Attributes That Control XML Serialization.
You can apply the to a class, structure, enumeration, or interface declaration.

Apply the to a class to specify the XML type's namespace, the XML type name, and whether to include the type in the XML schema document. To see the results of setting the properties of the class, compile your application as an executable or DLL, and pass the resulting file to the XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe). The tool writes the schema, including the type definition.

block.para: If you set the property to false, the XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe) does not include the type in the schema. By default, for each public class, the XSD tool generates a complexType and an element of that type.

remarks.para: For more information about using attributes, see Extending Metadata Using Attributes.

block.para: You can use the word XmlType in your code instead of the longer .

summary.para: Controls the XML schema that is generated when the attribute target is serialized by the .

remarks.para: Apply the to a class to specify the XML type's namespace, the XML type name, and whether to include the type in the XML schema document. summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class and specifies the name of the XML type.

Docs.param: The name of the XML type that the generates when it serializes the class instance (and recognizes when it deserializes the class instance).

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the resulting schema type is an XSD anonymous type.

Docs.value: To be added: an object of type 'bool'

The tool writes the schema, including the type definition.

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to include the type in XML schema documents.

summary.para: Gets or sets the namespace of the XML type.
